# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs with exceptional quality and functionality. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an attractive discount. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer
